CLEO.0AA2:
int iTmp
if and
    not iTmp = load_dynamic_library {fileName} "SilentPatchIII.asi"
    not iTmp = load_dynamic_library {fileName} "SilentPatchVC.asi"
    not iTmp = load_dynamic_library {fileName} "SilentPatchSA.asi"
then
    print_help_formatted "SilentPatch not detected!"
end
CLEO.0AA4:
int libCleo
if
    not libCleo = load_dynamic_library "CLEO.asi"
then
    print_help_formatted {text} "~r~ERROR:~s~ Failed to load CLEO.asi"
    terminate_this_script
end


// approach 1
int procAddr
if 
    not procAddr = get_dynamic_library_procedure "_CLEO_GetVersion@0" {library} libCleo
then
    print_help_formatted {text} "~r~ERROR:~s~ Failed to get CLEO_GetVersion procedure"
    terminate_this_script
end

int ver = call_function_return procAddr {params} 0 {pop} 0
print_help_formatted {text} "CLEO version is %X" ver


wait 3000


// approach 2 - use Sanny Builder 4 foreign functions syntax
function Export_Arg_0_Ret<stdcall>() : int // define function type
Export_Arg_0_Ret CLEO_GetGameDirectory // variable
if
    not CLEO_GetGameDirectory = get_dynamic_library_procedure "_CLEO_GetGameDirectory@0" {library} libCleo
then
    print_help_formatted {text} "~r~ERROR:~s~ Failed to get CLEO_GetGameDirectory procedure"
    terminate_this_script
end

int dir = CLEO_GetGameDirectory()
print_help_formatted {text} "Game directory is: %s" dir
CLEO.0AB0:
while true
    wait 0

    if
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
    then
        print_help_formatted {text} "~r~Key pressed!"

        
        // wait for key release
        while is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
            wait 0
        end
        
        print_help_formatted {text} "~g~Key released!"
    end
end
CLEO.0AB1:
while true
    wait 250
    
    if and
        is_player_playing $player1
        test_cheat "gun"
    then
        int ammo = GIVE_PLAYER_WEAPON(38) // this is actually CLEO_CALL command
        print_help_formatted {text} "%d bullets!" {args} ammo
    end
end

function GIVE_PLAYER_WEAPON(weaponType :int) : int
    int modelIdx = get_weapontype_model {weapon_type} weaponType
    request_model {modelId} modelIdx
    load_all_models_now
    
    give_weapon_to_char $scplayer {weaponType} weaponType {ammo} 100
    
    mark_model_as_no_longer_needed {modelId} modelIdx
    
    // check and return ammo count
    int ammo = get_ammo_in_char_weapon $scplayer {weaponType} weaponType
    cleo_return 1 ammo
end
CLEO.0AD1:
while true
    wait 0
    
    char playerChar = get_player_char 0 // player 1
    
    float x, y, z
    x, y, z = get_char_coordinates playerChar
    
    int worldIdx = get_char_area_visible playerChar
    
    print_formatted_now {format} "Position: %0.1f %0.1f %0.1f ~n~ Interior: %d" {time} 50 {args} x y z worldIdx
end
CLEO.0AD3:
int buf = allocate_memory 64
string_format buf "%d + %d = %d" 2 2 4
free_memory buf
CLEO.0AD7:
debug_on // enable trace command

if
    int fileaHandle = open_file {filePathName} "root:\cleo\.cleo.log" {mode} "rt"
then
    int buffer = allocate_memory {size} 64
    if
        read_string_from_file fileaHandle {storeTo} buffer {maxLength} 64
    then
        trace "Read data: %s" buffer
    else
        trace "Failed to read data"
    end
    
    // cleanup
    free_memory {address} buffer
    close_file fileaHandle
else
    trace "Failed to open the file"
end
CLEO.0AD9: write_formatted_string_to_file outputFile {format} "Timer is %d.%c" {args} TimerA 0x0A // end of line
CLEO.0ADC:
while true
    wait 0
    
    if 
        test_cheat "TEST"
    then
        print_help_string {text} "Cheat activated"
    end
end
CLEO.0ADD:
while true
    wait 100
    
    if
        test_cheat {input} "car"
    then
        int modelIdx = generate_random_int_in_range {min} 400 {max} 600
        print_help_formatted {text} "Car model: %d" {args} modelIdx
        
        spawn_vehicle_by_cheating {modelId} modelIdx
    end
end
CLEO.0AE1:
while true
    wait 100
    
    if
        test_cheat "1"
    then
        float x, y, z
        x, y, z = get_active_camera_coordinates
        
        int ped = get_random_char_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 30.0 {find_next} false {filter} CharSearchFilter.AliveNPC // get first
        while ped <> -1
            explode_char_head ped
            
            ped = get_random_char_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 30.0 {find_next} true {filter} CharSearchFilter.AliveNPC // get next
        end
    end
end
CLEO.0AE2:
while true
    wait {time} 100

    float x, y, z
    x, y, z = get_active_camera_coordinates
    
    int color = generate_random_int_in_range {min} 0 {max} 9
    
    // iterate near cars
    int handle = get_random_car_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 40.0 {findNext} false {skipWrecked} true // initialize search, get first
    while handle <> -1 // found!
        change_car_colour handle {color1} color {color2} color
        
        handle = get_random_car_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 40.0 {findNext} true {skipWrecked} true // get next
    end
end
CLEO.0AE3:
while true
    wait {time} 0 // once every render frame

    float x, y, z
    x, y, z = get_active_camera_coordinates
        
    // iterate near objects
    int handle = get_random_object_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 30.0 {findNext} false // initialize search, get first
    while handle <> -1 // found!
        DRAW_OBJECT_INFO(handle) // call function for every found object

        handle = get_random_object_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 30.0 {findNext} true // get next
    end
end


// display text at 3d coordinates
function DRAW_OBJECT_INFO(obj :int)
    int modelIdx = get_object_model obj

    float pos[3]
    pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] = get_object_coordinates obj

    float screenPos[2]
    float screenSize[2]
    screenPos[0], screenPos[1], screenSize[0], screenSize[1] = convert_3d_to_screen_2d {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2] {nearClip} true {farClip} true
    
    use_text_commands {state} true
    
    // calculate our font proportions
    screenSize[0] = screenSize[1]
    screenSize[0] *= 0.3 
    set_text_scale {widthScale} screenSize[0] {heightScale} screenSize[1]
    
    set_text_centre {state} true
    
    set_text_colour {rgb} 255 255 0 {alpha} 255
    set_text_edge {size} 1 {RGBA} 0 0 0 64
    
    display_text_formatted {offsetLeft} screenPos[0] {offsetTop} screenPos[1] {format} "%d" {args} modelIdx
end

default.00A5:
while true
    wait 0
    get_area_visible store_to interiorId
    if and
        is_key_pressed Key_F10
        interiorId == Outside
    then
        while is_key_pressed Key_F10
            wait 0
        end
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        repeat 
            wait 0
        until has_model_loaded #HUSTLER
        get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
        get_closest_car_node_with_heading x y z store_to nodeX nodeY nodeZ heading
        clear_area nodeX nodeY nodeZ 3.0 False
        create_car #HUSTLER nodeX nodeY nodeZ store_to Car
        set_car_heading Car heading
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed Car
        mark_model_as_no_longer_needed #HUSTLER
    end
end

default.03D3:
while true
    wait 0

    int interiorId = get_area_visible 
    if and
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
        interiorId == 0 // outside
    then
        // wait for key release
        while is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
            wait 0
        end
        
        float pos[3]
        pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] = get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords $scplayer {offset} 0.0 5.0 0.0

        
        float dir
        pos[0], pos[1], pos[2], dir = get_closest_car_node_with_heading {pos} pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] // find road
        
        clear_area {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2] {radius} 3.0 {clearParticles} false
        
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        int carHandle = create_car {modelId} #HUSTLER {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2]
        set_car_heading carHandle {heading} dir
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed carHandle // will despawn on its own
    end
end
